MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L34 postcode area of Knowsley affecting Knowsley Park and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.10am. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a broken overhead equipment at Knowsley Hall Laundry and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.58am on Oct 24, 2020.
